solitaire

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • solitaire.Field

  • class Field
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes the model of a playing field

      • getSlotNumber

        int getSlotNumber(java.lang.String[][] playingField,
                  java.lang.String[] pile,
                  int freeSlotsInPile)
        This method gets the slot number from the player, checks it for compliance with the format and availability
        Parameters:
        playingField - current state of the playing field
        pile - current state of the discard pile
        freeSlotsInPile - number of free slots in discard pile
        Returns:
        available number of slot for placing taken card
